title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1217/91 of 8 May 1991 fixing for the 1991 marketing year the Community offer prices for peaches including nectarines applicable with regard to Spain and Portugal
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 1217/91  of 8 May 1991  fixing for the 1991 marketing year the Community offer prices for peaches including nectarines applicable with regard to Spain and Portugal
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
For the 1991 marketing year, the Community offer prices for peaches including nectarines falling within CN code 0809 30 00 applicable with regard to Spain and Portugal, expressed in ecus per 100 kilograms net of packed products of Class I, of  all sizes shall be as follows:
- June (11 to 20): 69,04
(21 to 30): 60,33
- July: 58,14
- August: 56,36
- September: 55,13.
This Regulation shall enter into force on 11 June 1991. This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 8 May 1991. For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 363, 13. 12. 1989, p. 3. (2) OJ No L 362, 27. 12. 1990, p. 16. (3) OJ No L 366, 29. 12. 1990, p. 43.
